name: <name to display to user>
remindEmail: <email address used to send remind password emails>
remindEmailDataType: <way of finding data stored in email. Only 'element' can be used at this time>
remindEmailDataAttribute: <if remindEmailDataType is equal to 'element' you can specify what attribute to read>
remindEmailDataSelector: <if remindEmailDataType is equal to 'element' you should specify the jQuery selector to find your element>
